name: ATV RAMP RIDER - Monster ATV Stunt Rider For Kids
name_original: ATV RAMP RIDER - Monster ATV Stunt Rider For Kids
description:
ATV RAMP RIDER - Monster ATV Stunt Rider For Kids is heart-pounding, visually astounding 3D racing game that puts the steering wheel directly in your hands.

Experience all of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing. This is handheld racing like you've never seen before, in the most stunning, realistic and intuitive racer on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. Get ATV RAMP RIDER - FREE 3D ATV RACING GAME today, and find out what everyone is raving about!

Features:
-30 visually amazing and challenging Levels
-Simple,Smooth and effective Controls
-Astonishing physics brings chaos to another level
-Intelligent enemies driving beautiful racing cars
-Highly detailed 3D Graphics
-Supports both Touch Controls and Tilt Controls
